title: University Reading
description: Intended for Advanced Grades: 11/12 as well as University Freshmen/First Year. This course examines the Canon [Great Literary Works] featured across Ivy League and Top Universities in the US, Canada, and the UK.

title: Advanced Reading I
description: Close Reading Tactics: how to increase Reading Comprehension. A detailed exploration of 10 Literary Masterpieces. Part One.
